languages.text: Отныне рекруты с сомнительной репутацией обязаны проходить процедуру покаяния. Раскаявшись, благодарные беглецы проявляют особое усердие в уничтожении всего, что когда-либо связывало их с темным прошлым.

traits.locale_text: Отныне рекруты с сомнительной репутацией обязаны проходить процедуру покаяния. Раскаявшись, благодарные беглецы проявляют особое усердие в уничтожении всего, что когда-либо связывало их с темным прошлым.

languages.text: From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.
languages.original_text: Отныне рекруты с сомнительной репутацией обязаны проходить процедуру покаяния. Раскаявшись, благодарные беглецы проявляют особое усердие в уничтожении всего, что когда-либо связывало их с темным прошлым.

traits.locale_text: From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

languages.text: Von nun an erwartet Rekruten mit zweifelhaftem Hintergrund ein Bußverfahren, und die dankbaren Flüchtigen werden sehr darum bemüht sein, alle Verbindungen zu ihrer dunklen Vergangenheit zu zerstören.
languages.original_text: From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

traits.locale_text: Von nun an erwartet Rekruten mit zweifelhaftem Hintergrund ein Bußverfahren, und die dankbaren Flüchtigen werden sehr darum bemüht sein, alle Verbindungen zu ihrer dunklen Vergangenheit zu zerstören.

languages.text: Désormais, les recrues au passé douteux pourront se repentir. En reconnaissance, ces fugitifs redoubleront de zèle pour détruire tout ce qui serait lié à leur passé de criminels.
languages.original_text: From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

traits.locale_text: Désormais, les recrues au passé douteux pourront se repentir. En reconnaissance, ces fugitifs redoubleront de zèle pour détruire tout ce qui serait lié à leur passé de criminels.

languages.text: 从现在开始，所有背景可疑的新船员都会进行赎罪改造。众多逃犯对行商浪人心怀感激，他们带着常人难以企及的热忱，誓与不光彩的过去划清界限。
languages.original_text: From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

traits.locale_text: 从现在开始，所有背景可疑的新船员都会进行赎罪改造。众多逃犯对行商浪人心怀感激，他们带着常人难以企及的热忱，誓与不光彩的过去划清界限。

languages.text: A partir de ahora, los reclutas de pasado dudoso se someterán a un procedimiento de penitencia, de forma que los fugitivos, agradecidos, destruirán con entusiasmo todo lo que pueda vincularlos con su oscuro pasado.
languages.original_text: From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

traits.locale_text: A partir de ahora, los reclutas de pasado dudoso se someterán a un procedimiento de penitencia, de forma que los fugitivos, agradecidos, destruirán con entusiasmo todo lo que pueda vincularlos con su oscuro pasado.

languages.text: 今後、素性の怪しい新兵は贖罪の手順を受けることになる。恩義を感じた逃亡者たちは、自らの暗い過去と結びつくすべてを破壊することに、ひときわ熱心になるだろう。
languages.original_text: From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

traits.locale_text: 今後、素性の怪しい新兵は贖罪の手順を受けることになる。恩義を感じた逃亡者たちは、自らの暗い過去と結びつくすべてを破壊することに、ひときわ熱心になるだろう。

languages.text: Şüpheli geçmişleri olan yeni üyeler, bundan böyle bir kefaret prosedüründen geçecek. Dolayısıyla minnettar olan kaçaklar da karanlık geçmişlerine dair her şeyi ortadan kaldırma konusunda özellikle gayretli olacaklardır.
languages.original_text: From now on, recruits with dubious backgrounds will undergo a penance procedure, and those grateful fugitives will be particularly zealous in destroying everything that has ever linked them to their dark past.

traits.locale_text: Bundan böyle, şüpheli geçmişleri olan yeni üyeler bir kefaret prosedüründen geçecek, dolayısıyla minnettar olan kaçaklar da karanlık geçmişlerine dair her şeyi ortadan kaldırma konusunda özellikle gayretli olacaklardır.
